読み悪い: (よみにくい) - hard to read; illegible
読み慣れる: (よみなれる) - to be accustomed to reading

読み損う: (よみそこなう) - to misread; to mispronounce
読み損じる: (よみそんじる) - to fail to read correctly
読み損なう: (よみそこなう) - to misread; to mispronounce

読み札: (よみふだ) - cards with words or phrases written on them, used in Japanese karuta games
読み止す: (よみさす) - to leave half-read or unfinished
読み流す: (よみながす) - to read smoothly; to skim

読み物: (よみもの) - reading matter; reading material
読み癖: (よみくせ) - idiomatic pronunciation or peculiar reading of a kanji or compound
読み直す: (よみなおす) - to read (a book, etc.) over again
読み破る: (よみやぶる) - to read through (difficult passage or particularly long book)
読み終る: (よみおわる) - to finish reading; to read through
読み終わる: (よみおわる) - to finish reading; to read through
読み継ぐ: (よみつぐ) - to read in succession (e.g. by many readers)
読み耽ける: (よみふける) - to be absorbed in reading
読み耽る: (よみふける) - to be absorbed in reading
読み聞かす: (よみきかす) - to read to (for) someone
読み聞かせる: (よみきかせる) - to read aloud to another
読み落とす: (よみおとす) - to overlook in reading
読み解く: (よみとく) - to read and understand/to subject to close analysis/to read deeply/to read carefully (esp. a difficult text); to decipher/to decode
読み誤まる: (よみあやまる) - to mispronounce; to misread/to misinterpret/to read wrongly
読み誤る: (よみあやまる) - to mispronounce; to misread/to misinterpret/to read wrongly
読み込む: (よみこむ) - to read thoroughly/to read repeatedly; to express (e.g. emotion in poetry); to read (extra meaning) into (something); to fetch (e.g. CPU inst.)/to read (data into a system)/to load
読み返す: (よみかえす) - to reread; to read again
読み進む: (よみすすむ) - to go on reading
読み過ごす: (よみすごす) - to skip over; to miss reading
読み過す: (よみすごす) - to skip over; to miss reading
読み難い: (よみにくい) - hard to read; illegible
読み飛ばす: (よみとばす) - to skip over (while reading); to skim
読み馴れる: (よみなれる) - to be accustomed to reading
読む: (yomu) - to read; to count , to read; to count; to guess, to predict, to read (os pensamentos de alguém), to see (e.g. into someone's heart), to divine

読んで字の如く: (よんでじのごとく) - literally; self-explanatorily

読人知らず: (よみびとしらず) - author unknown/anonymous; unknown waka composer
読付ける: (よみつける) - to be accustomed to reading

読書灯: (どくしょとう) - reading light; reading lamp
